install_new_model.reason: Better balance of capability and resource usage for Bangla language support

test_cases.name: Bangla Language Support
test_cases.prompt: বাংলায় ২ লাইনের সারাংশ লিখুন: আজ আকাশে অনেক মেঘ।

test_cases.name: JSON Generation
test_cases.prompt: Return ONLY valid JSON. Create a todo list with 3 items.

test_cases.name: Code Generation
test_cases.prompt: Write a python function that returns fib(10). Only return the function, no explanation.

implementation_steps: 1. Download Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct-GGUF using the provided command
2. Verify the model loads correctly with lazy loading
3. Test all three test cases to validate functionality
4. Update configuration to use the new model as default
5. Remove the safe_to_delete models to free disk space
6. Document the migration in the model registry
